title: How to remove "tool tips" in Android 11
content: I have a new Pixel 5 with Android 11. Apparently a new "feature" has been introduced that displays text  "tool tips" under buttons. I`ve used Android since 2.3 and cannot imagine why these distractions were added. I'm hoping it is just some kind of accessibility setting that has been inadvertently turned on, not a permanent annoyance.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
